title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
OB: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, a dialog appears with inappropriate default folder options such as the desktop and my computer. It should instead provide a default folder that is relevant to the project's content location.
EB: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, the dialog should have a default folder that points to the project's content location.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open Eclipse on a Windows XP machine.
2. Go to the Import option.
3. Select 'Existing Eclipse Project'.
4. Click the Browse button.
